SvcCatalogCategoryItem.name: SvcCatalogCategoryItem
SvcCatalogCategoryItem.description: Represents the assignment of this service to a category within the Service Catalog.

IsPrimaryCategory.description: Determines if the catalog category (SvcCatalogCategory) is the primary category for this catalog item. EachSvcCatalogItemDef component can only have one category with this attribute set to true.

SortOrder.description: The position of the catalog item relative to other catalog items in the catalog category.

SvcCatalogCategoryId.description: The catalog category that the catalog item is assigned to.

SvcCatalogCategoryItem.accessRules: To access this object, get the Service Catalog Access permission set license, Employee Productivity Starter license, or Employee Productivity Plus add-on license.
